file.name: Billing Entries
file.description: A dataset containing information about billing entries for legal matters handled by a law firm. Each record represents a single billing entry with details about the matter, attorney, hours worked, rate, and description of the work done.

columns.name: entry_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the billing entry

columns.name: file_id
columns.description: Identifier for the legal matter or file associated with the billing entry

columns.name: att_id
columns.description: Identifier for the attorney associated with the billing entry

columns.name: hours
columns.description: Number of hours worked on the task described in the billing entry

columns.name: rate
columns.description: Hourly rate charged for the work done, in dollars

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Total amount billed for the work done, calculated as hours worked times rate, in dollars

columns.name: description
columns.description: Brief description of the work done or service provided, as recorded in the billing entry

columns.name: entry_date
columns.description: Date when the billing entry was recorded, in various formats including Unix timestamp and date strings

file.name: Document Records
file.description: A dataset containing information about documents related to legal matters or cases, including document identifiers, types, titles, creation dates, and upload details. Each record represents a single document with its associated metadata.

columns.name: item.doc_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the document

columns.name: item.matter_id
columns.description: Identifier for the legal matter or case associated with the document

columns.name: item.client
columns.description: Identifier for the client associated with the document or matter

columns.name: item.doc_type
columns.description: Type or category of the document (e.g., Correspondence, Motion, Agreement)

columns.name: item.title
columns.description: Title or brief description of the document

columns.name: item.created
columns.description: Date when the document was created, in the format DD/MM/YY or DD/MM/YYYY

columns.name: item.uploaded_by
columns.description: Name of the user who uploaded the document

columns.name: item.file_type
columns.description: File format or extension of the document (e.g., pdf, txt)

file.name: Legal Matters
file.description: A dataset containing information about legal matters or cases handled by a law firm. Each record represents a single legal matter with details about the case, client, practice area, assigned attorney, and case value. The dataset appears to cover various practice areas such as Tax, Environmental, and Litigation, indicating a diverse range of legal services provided by the firm.

columns.name: matter_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal matter, formatted as 'MAT-' followed by a numeric code

columns.name: client_ref
columns.description: Identifier for the client associated with the matter, formatted as 'CL-' followed by a numeric code

columns.name: title
columns.description: Brief description or title of the legal matter, including the name of the client or parties involved and a brief summary of the case
columns.example: Healthcare Solutions Inc v. ACME Corp - Employment Dispute

columns.name: practice_area
columns.description: The area of law or legal specialty that the matter falls under, such as Tax, Environmental, or Litigation

columns.name: opened_on
columns.description: Date when the legal matter was opened, primarily in the format 'dd/mm/yyyy' but with at least one instance in a Unix timestamp format

columns.name: lead_attorney
columns.description: The name of the attorney assigned to lead the legal matter

columns.name: estimated_value
columns.description: The estimated monetary value of the legal matter, with variations in format including numeric values, values with a thousands separator ('K'), and currency symbols

file.name: Legal Matters
file.description: A dataset containing information about legal matters or cases handled by a law firm. Each record represents a single legal matter with details about the case, client, practice area, assigned attorney, and start date.

columns.name: item.file_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal matter

columns.name: item.client_id
columns.description: Identifier for the client associated with the matter

columns.name: item.matterSummary
columns.description: Brief summary or description of the legal matter
columns.example: Healthcare Solutions Inc v. ACME Corp - Employment Dispute

columns.name: item.area
columns.description: Practice area or category of law related to the matter

columns.name: item.startDate
columns.description: Date when the legal matter started, in various formats (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YY)

columns.name: item.owner
columns.description: Name of the attorney or owner assigned to the legal matter

file.name: Client Records
file.description: A dataset containing information about clients, including their company details, industry, financial data, and contact information. Each record represents a single client with various attributes.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: Name of the client's company

columns.name: industry
columns.description: Industry or sector in which the client's company operates

columns.name: annual_revenue
columns.description: The client's company annual revenue, including currency symbol where applicable

columns.name: contact_phone
columns.description: Phone number for contacting the client

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Date and/or timestamp when the client record was created, with varying formats

file.name: Client Records
file.description: A dataset containing information about client companies, including their identifiers, names, sectors, financial details, contact information, and registration dates. Each record represents a single client entity with various attributes.

columns.name: item.id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client

columns.name: item.custFullNm
columns.description: Full name of the client company

columns.name: item.sector
columns.description: Industry sector in which the client operates

columns.name: item.financials.turnover
columns.description: Annual turnover of the client company, represented as a numeric value

columns.name: item.financials.currency
columns.description: Currency in which the client's financials are denominated

columns.name: item.phone
columns.description: Phone number of the client company

columns.name: item.meta.registered_on
columns.description: Date when the client was registered, in various date formats (e.g., MM/DD/YY, DD-MMM-YYYY)

file.name: Client Records
file.description: A dataset containing information about clients, including their industry, revenue, contact details, and creation date. Each record represents a single client with various attributes that describe the client's profile and business metrics.

columns.name: cust_code
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client

columns.name: clientName
columns.description: Name of the client

columns.name: industry
columns.description: Industry or sector the client operates in

columns.name: revenue
columns.description: Numeric value representing the client's revenue

columns.name: phone
columns.description: Phone number of the client

columns.name: created
columns.description: Date when the client record was created, with varying formats (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, DD/MM/YY, Unix timestamp)
